busDelivery.question: How does bus-based delivery to Morocco work?
busDelivery.answer: Your package travels with verified bus drivers on regular routes from European cities to Morocco. We partner with trusted bus companies operating daily routes like Paris-Casablanca, Lyon-Marrakech, and Madrid-Tangier. You drop off your package at our pickup point, we hand it to the driver, and it's delivered door-to-door in Morocco with full tracking.

deliveryTime.question: How long does delivery from Europe to Morocco take?
deliveryTime.answer: Average delivery time is 3-5 days from major European cities to Morocco. Paris to Casablanca typically takes 3-4 days, while routes from Germany or Netherlands take 4-5 days. We provide real-time tracking updates throughout the journey.

customs.question: What can I send to Morocco? Any customs restrictions?
customs.answer: You can send gifts, documents, clothing, electronics, and most personal items. Moroccan customs prohibits weapons, drugs, alcohol, and pork products. Items valued over ‚Ç¨40 may require customs declaration. We recommend keeping receipts for electronics and valuable items.

eid.question: Can I ship gifts for Eid or Ramadan?
eid.answer: Absolutely! We offer priority Eid shipping to ensure your gifts arrive before the celebration. During Ramadan and Eid periods, we recommend booking 10-14 days in advance due to high demand. Traditional Moroccan pastries, clothing, and gift items are welcome (no perishables).

insurance.question: Is my package insured during transit?
insurance.answer: All shipments include complimentary insurance coverage up to ‚Ç¨500. For valuable items like electronics, jewelry, or important documents, we offer premium insurance up to ‚Ç¨5,000 for a small additional fee.

verification.question: How are bus drivers verified?
verification.answer: We only partner with licensed bus companies with established European-Morocco routes. All drivers undergo background checks, have valid commercial driver licenses, and are trained in package handling. Our bus partners have been operating Morocco routes for 10+ years.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. You can see prices in both EUR and MAD (Moroccan Dirham). All transactions are processed securely through Stripe with 3D Secure authentication.

support.question: How can I contact customer support?
support.answer: Reach our multilingual support team (French, Arabic, English) via WhatsApp at +33 XX XXX XXXX, email at support@tawsilgo.com, or in-app chat. We're available 7 days a week, 9 AM - 9 PM CET. Average response time is under 2 hours.

tracking.question: Where can I track my package?
tracking.answer: Once your package is collected, you'll receive a tracking number via SMS and email. Track in real-time through our mobile app or website. You'll get updates when the bus departs Europe, crosses into Morocco, clears customs, and arrives at the destination city.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about shipping between Europe and Morocco
faq.noResults: No questions match your search. Try different keywords or contact us directly.

q1.question: How long does shipping from Europe to Morocco take?
q1.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express service is available in 3-4 days for major cities like Casablanca, Rabat, and Marrakech.

q2.question: What items can I ship to Morocco?
q2.answer: You can ship most personal items, gifts, documents, electronics, and clothing. Prohibited items include perishables, alcohol, weapons, and medications. Check our full restrictions list in the shipping guidelines.

q3.question: Do you offer door-to-door delivery in Morocco?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide door-to-door delivery to all major Moroccan cities. For remote areas, delivery may be to the nearest bus station with local pickup available.

q4.question: What is the maximum package weight?
q4.answer: Standard parcels can weigh up to 30kg. For heavier shipments (up to 100kg), please contact our business support team for custom quotes.

q5.question: How are packages protected during transit?
q5.answer: All packages are securely wrapped, tracked throughout the journey, and handled by trained drivers. Insurance coverage is available for valuable items up to ‚Ç¨1,000.

q1.question: How is shipping cost calculated?
q1.answer: Pricing is based on package weight, dimensions, departure city, and destination in Morocco. Use our instant quote calculator on the pricing page for exact costs.

q2.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q2.answer: No. The price you see includes pickup, transit, and delivery. The only additional cost might be Moroccan customs duties if your package value exceeds ‚Ç¨150.

q3.question: Do you offer business discounts?
q3.answer: Yes! Businesses shipping regularly can save 15-30% with our volume pricing plans. Contact our business team for a custom quote.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, and bank transfers. Business accounts can also pay on invoice with NET-30 terms.

q1.question: Do I need to fill out customs forms?
q1.answer: Yes, for shipments to Morocco you'll need to provide a detailed contents list and values. Our booking system guides you through this process automatically.

q2.question: Will my package be charged customs duties?
q2.answer: Moroccan customs applies duties on packages valued over ‚Ç¨150. Duties range from 2.5% to 40% depending on the item category. We provide estimated duty calculations during booking.

q3.question: How long does customs clearance take?
q3.answer: Typically 1-2 business days. Our team monitors clearance status and proactively handles any documentation requests to minimize delays.

q4.question: What happens if customs rejects my package?
q4.answer: We'll notify you immediately. You can either provide additional documentation, pay applicable duties, or have the package returned to the sender (return shipping fees apply).

q1.question: How do I track my package?
q1.answer: Use your tracking number on our tracking page. You'll receive real-time updates via email and SMS at each milestone: picked up, in transit, customs clearance, and delivered.

q2.question: Why hasn't my tracking updated?
q2.answer: Tracking updates when packages reach checkpoints. During transit between cities, updates may pause for 24-48 hours. If there's no update after 72 hours, contact support.

q3.question: Can I change delivery address after shipping?
q3.answer: Address changes are possible before the package reaches Morocco. Contact support immediately with your tracking number. A ‚Ç¨10 address modification fee applies.

q4.question: What if my package shows delivered but I didn't receive it?
q4.answer: Contact support immediately with your tracking number. We'll investigate with our driver and provide proof of delivery. If unresolved, insurance claims can be filed within 7 days.

q1.question: Do you ship to all cities in Morocco?
q1.answer: We deliver to all major Moroccan cities including Casablanca, Rabat, Marrakech, Tangier, Fez, Agadir, and more. Rural areas may require pickup from the nearest hub.

q2.question: Can I schedule a pickup from my home?
q2.answer: Yes! During booking, select 'Home Pickup' and choose your preferred date and time window. Pickup is available in most European cities for an additional ‚Ç¨5-10.

q3.question: What is your refund policy?
q3.answer: Full refunds are available if you cancel before pickup. After pickup, refunds are provided only if we fail to deliver within the promised timeframe (excluding customs delays).
